summary: A dog with a spying device under its skin is sent to the Russian government as a present. When the Russians send the dog to a veterinary, British spy must get to the dog first and retrieve the spying device.
cast: Laurence Harvey|Daliah Lavi|Lionel Jeffries|Eric Sykes|Eric Portman|Denholm Elliott|Colin Blakely|Robert Flemyng|June Whitfield|Bernard Archard|Robin Bailey|Paul Ford|Nai Bonet|Michael Trubshawe|Bruce Carstairs|Genevieve|Glen Mason|Norma Foster|Terry Brooks|Trevor Delaney|Steve Morley|Gillian Lewis|Wanda Ventham|Amy Dalby|Tricia De Dulin|Virginia Lyon|Julian Orchard|John Forbes-Robertson|Arnold Diamond|R.S.M. Brittain|Lewis Alexander|Peter Bayliss|Hyma Beckley|Maxwell Craig|Barry Cryer|Helen Goss|Gordon Gostelow|Olivia Hamnett|Walter Henry|Renee Houston|Juba Kennerley|Aileen Lewis|Marianne Stone|Jack Woolgar
title: Regalo a los rusos
